title: Linux.XP.def.exclusive (Kingdom-Apps by def)
description:
Linux XP def Exclusive

Look and feel of Windows XP without spending a bundle!
No more on line activation or product key required!
Install on as many computers as you like!
Thousands of free software applications available!
Full suite of software packages included on the disk!
Dual boot CD - Try it out from the CD before installing!
Give that old computer a new life!
This distribution of Linux has the look and feel of Windows XP but without the cost. It comes pre-Installed with all the programs to make this a complete solution. Comes with FireFox WebBrowser,  Client, Gaim Instant Messaging (compatible with MSN, AOL, YAHOO IM), Movie & Music Players, Picture Editor, OpenOffice Office Suite and more....
This is one of the best and easiest to use Linux desktops available


*translated the russian txt to english
*iso is now bootable



this for everyone who requested it fixed and not on rs.com
